  • Today I went for a bike ride in my kitchen

     · 13 Feb 2026

    My current main hobby is biking. I enjoy the time spent in the saddle, seeing my fitness progress by longer rides at a faster pace while recovering quicker. I enjoy biking outdoors. However, most of 2026 so far have seen the ground covered in a white layer called snow with temperatures below freezing. Not ideal conditions for biking outdoors.
